title: AEW's Tony Khan on the 'Best Wrestling Show on TV'
itunes:title: AEW's Tony Khan on the 'Best Wrestling Show on TV'
description:
Tony Khan, Co-Owner / Chief Football Strategy Officer of the Jacksonville Jaguars, Owner/GM of Fulham F.C., and President & CEO of AEW Wrestling, joins Scarlet and Lynch to discuss the competitive landscape in pro wrestling, AEW's television expansion, sports analytics, and the European Super League drama.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
